titleStmt.title: Englands fortresse: exemplified in the most renowned and victorious, his Excellency, the Lord Fairfax, Commander in Chiefe of the Parl. Army. / Humbly presented unto his Excellency by E.C. lover of peace.
titleStmt.author: Calver, Edward, fl. 1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
